topic: Master's thesis submission in the Koinon system

correspondence.message: I would like to ask if I have to print out the page in my master's thesis where I certify that the work is my own and sign it by hand, or if I can write my family name there and upload the document as a PDF in Koinon."
You only have to submit the work in the Koinon portal. There is a checkbox there that replaces the page you wrote. If you confirm in the portal that the thesis is your own work, that is sufficient.
